text: Max Moszkowicz Sr. (5 October 1926 â€“ 27 January 2022) was a Dutch lawyer. The Jewish Moszkowicz family fled Nazi Germany in 1933."Mr. Max Moszkowicz - de pleitvader. vechten voor recht". Author: Henk ten Berge. Nederlands - Paperback. 224 pages | Bzztoh | November 1998 During the Holocaust his parents were murdered. Moszkowicz survived Auschwitz. He became well known in the Netherlands for defending Dutch criminals. Moszkowicz was a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD). Max Moszkowicz, Volkskrant, 4 January 1997 Moszkowicz died on 27 January 2022, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Dutch Jews Category:Dutch lawyers Category:Dutch people of World War II Category:German Jews Category:Holocaust survivors Category:Naturalised citizens of the Netherlands Category:People from Essen Category:Refugees from Nazism
title: Max Moszkowicz
